pull.title: [RPC][QT] UI support for abandoned transactions
pull.body: This PR adds the "abandoned" state to the RPC call `listtransaction` (only outgoing transactions), it also adds a context menu option to abandon a transaction over the GUI. Abandoned transaction are marked with a light-red color and a "trash" icon. Some screens:

events.body: Added serval things: - table row will be updated (redrawn) after a transaction has been abandoned (new color / change icon) - "Abandon transaction" action is only available if tx is not in mempool and has no confirmation (otherwise it's disabled) - Simple reordering of the context menu (keep mutable action together)
utACK on 42e945d only for backport to 0.12
@jonasschnelli can you please rebase so the `rpcwallet.cpp` file is not touched here?

ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7707/commits/3d580e55599c0a911ba79a5c0df94b4391d4dae4

For other testers: start with `-walletbroadcast=0`.

comments.body:
Nit: Document the author?

Edit: Also you may want to consider adding the source svg and running optimize png, if not already done.
Nit: This is already merged? Needs rebase?
Also it looks like you forgot to add the documentation [here](https://github.com/jonasschnelli/bitcoin/blob/df80f3d097984fa3b5b31be9ed86d2b489dcb5ec/src/wallet/rpcwallet.cpp#L1441)?

   qt/res/icons/warning.png \

comments.body:
It's already optimized and the source SVG is not required because it's part of Hutchings typicons (we only added sourced for manipulated or self-created icons).
Also `src/qt/res/icons/transaction*.png` covers the copyright info in `contrib/debian/copyright`.
